rpc.datagen
Class CausalModelGenerator

java.lang.Object
  rpc.datagen.CausalModelGenerator

public class CausalModelGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

The Causal Model Generator generates a random causal model over the current schema with a pre-specified number of dependencies to add. The generator ensures that the model will be a valid causal model (e.g., it will not contain cyclic dependencies).

Constructor Summary
CausalModelGenerator(int numDependencies, int hop_threshold, int max_indegree)
          Create a random causal model with a given number of dependencies.

Constructor Detail

CausalModelGenerator

public CausalModelGenerator(int numDependencies,
                            int hop_threshold,
                            int max_indegree)
Create a random causal model with a given number of dependencies.

Parameters:
numDependencies - the number of dependencies to choose for the causal model.
hop_threshold - the hop threshold over the schema governs the set of possible dependencies.
max_indegree - the maximum in-degree (i.e., number of parents) for any variable.
Method Detail

hasNextDependency

public boolean hasNextDependency()
Checks whether or not there is any remaining dependencies to return for the iterator.

Returns:
true if there are dependencies/vertices that have not yet been returned; false if done.

getNextDependency

public VertexData getNextDependency()
If there is another dependency remaining, return the next one for which all parents have already been returned. This provides a partial ordering over the dependencies.

Returns:
a vertex data object that contains all necessary information to generate that particular variable.

resetIterator

public void resetIterator()
Reset the iterator to start from the beginning.

getNumDependencies

public int getNumDependencies()
Get the number of dependencies in the causal model.

Returns:
the number of dependencies in the causal model.

getModel

public Model getModel()
Get the model object that has been generated.

Returns:
the generated causal model.

parameterize

public Parameterization parameterize(org.python.core.PyDictionary ratios)
Jython overload: Get a random parameterization over the causal model structure.

Parameters:
ratios - Python dictionary containing the ratios of entity table sizes for each pair of entities involved in all relationships.
Returns:
a parameterization over the causal model structure.

parameterize

public Parameterization parameterize(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> ratios)
Get a random parameterization over the causal model structure.

Parameters:
ratios - the ratios of entity table sizes for each pair of entities involved in all relationships.
Returns:
a parameterization over the causal model structure.
